item.title: UDP load balancing using NGINX
item.description: Setup NGINX as an UDP load balancer TCP and UDP Load Balancing How to do it? Configuration - nginx.conf I used default nginx.conf and added stream block. user www-data; worker_processes auto; pid /run/nginx.pid; include /etc/nginx/modules-enabled/*.conf; events { worker_connections 768; # multi_accept on; } stream { upstream leaf_servers { server leaf1.teontest.site:1443; # UDP port server 1 server leaf2.teontest.site:1443; # UDP port server 2 } server { listen 1443 udp; # listen UDP port proxy_pass leaf_servers; } } http { ## # Basic Settings ## sendfile on; tcp_nopush on; types_hash_max_size 2048; # server_tokens off; # server_names_hash_bucket_size 64; # server_name_in_redirect off; include /etc/nginx/mime.
